sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { itemContext } from '../../store/context'; var store = require('store'); const DeliveryInfo = () => { const iL = useContext(itemContext); console.log("checkout in IL",iL); const { loggedIn } = iL.state; const getUserDetails = store.get('address'); console.log(getUserDetails,getUserDetails) const getItems = store.get('orderedItems'); console.log("getItems",getItems); const totalCost = store.get('totalCost') ?? 0; const offerPrice = () => { let oP = 0; if (totalCost >= 599 && totalCost < 999) { oP = 100; } else if (totalCost >= 999 && totalCost < 1300) { oP = 200; } else if (totalCost >= 1300) { oP = 300; } return oP; } return (
{loggedIn &&

"Thanks For Your Order. We will reach you soon with your delicious food"

} { getItems.length > 0 ? (

Order Details

Status: Delivery Pending
Payment Mode: Cash
Order Time: {new Date().toLocaleString()}
Delivery To: {}

Order Summary

{getItems.map(l => ( ))}
Item Name Item Price Quantity Amount
{l.itemName} {l.price} {l.quantity} {l.quantity * l.price}
Subtotal
₹{totalCost}
Delivery Charges
₹20
Offer Price
-₹{offerPrice()}
Total
₹{totalCost + 20 - offerPrice()}
) :
Something went wrong. Please visit the page after sometime.
}
) } export default DeliveryInfo;
